title: 013 - March Sadness Bracket Reveal Part 2
description: On today's show, the boys unveil the other side of the March Sadness bracket as we are still reeling without sports. Today, we spotlight the "Dahn In The Dumps" Region and the "Why God Why" Region, and their are quite a few strong teams in each region. The guys also get Connor's reaction to Tom Brady leaving the Patriots and their dynasty vanishing into thin air, and get a call from The Pod's resident Canadian diplomat. As always, stay safe out there, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
